Verses: 1 akkiramaththai Yosiththu, Thangal Padukkaigalinmel Pollaappuseyya Eththanampannith Thangal Kaiyil Vallamai Irukkirapadiyinaal, Vidiyarkaalamaagirapodhu Adhai Nadappiththu,
2 vayalgalai Ichchiththup Pariththukkondu, Veedugalai Ichchiththu Eduththukkondu, Purushanaiyum Avan Veettaiyum, Manushanaiyum Avan Sudhandharaththaiyum Odukkugiravargalukku Aiyo!

3 aagaiyaal Karththar: Naan Indha Vamsaththaarukku Virodhamaaith Theemaiyai Varuvikka Ninaikkiren; Adhinindru Neengal Kazhuththai Neekkamaatteergal; Neengal Mettimaiyaai Nadappadhillai; Adhu Theemaiyaana Kaalam.

4 annaalil Ungalperil Oppuchcholli, Naam Mutrilum Paazhaanom; Namadhu Janaththin Sudhandharaththai Maatrippottaar; Ennamaai Adhai Ennaivittu Neekkippottaar! Namadhu Vayalgalaip Pidungip Pagirndhukoduththaare Endru Thuyaramaana Pulambalaaip Pulambuvaargal.
5 karththarin Sabaiyil Sudhandharaveedhangalai Alandhukodukkiravargal Unakku Illaadhiruppaargal.
